update ci_project
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vcs_type = #{vcsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
git_url = #{gitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select
,g.name as group_name from ci_project p left join app_cluster g on p.app_cluster_id=g.id where p.del_flag!=1
AND g.name LIKE CONCAT('%','${groupName}','%')
AND p.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${projectName}','%')

select
from ci_project where app_cluster_id = #{appClusterId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and del_flag!=1
